alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:12PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 145 PM MST... At 112 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Rio Verde, or 11 miles west of Round Valley, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rio Verde. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River
